1

542 U.S. 912; Petitions for rehearing granted. Orders denying petitions for writs of certiorari vacated. Motions of petitioners for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Certiorari granted, judgments vacated, and cases remanded for further consideration in light of United States v. Booker, ante, p. 220.
